name: Hide header - The Christian Science Monitor
description: Auto-hides the page header, page footer, and right side bar. Less clutter, but nothing is removed from the page.
additional_info: The footer on this site can be reliably pinned to the bottom of the screen, but not to the bottom of the page. If you choose to pin it to the bottom of the page, that's where you'll see it, but it will be dimmed and not collapsed when hidden. [4059]
